message:
MVEL is a very good and cool project if you are using a JVM based language and you want to provide either full scripting language support or just minor predicates parser\interpreter support.
I am using it now, and it is pretty solid.
name: MVEL - Home
caption: mvel.codehaus.org
description: MVEL is a powerful expression language for Java-based applications. It provides a plethora of features and is suited for everything from the smallest property binding and extraction, to full blown scripts. For more information, jump right to the Getting Started Guide.
